thread.title: Meet Girija Oak, the internet's latest crush in a blue saree; here's all you should know about the viral sensation - The Economic Times
thread.title_full: Meet Girija Oak, the internet's latest crush in a blue saree; here's all you should know about the viral sensation - The Economic Times

title: Meet Girija Oak, the internet's latest crush in a blue saree; here's all you should know about the viral sensation - The Economic Times
text: The woman captivating the internet in that viral video — elegantly dressed in a blue saree and sharing witty anecdotes from her life, including the now-famous story about her physics teacher who mispronounced “waves” as “babes” — is none other than Girija Oak.Though a prominent face in Marathi theatre and cinema, Girija Oak has also made occasional appearances in Hindi films and shows, earning credits in Taare Zameen Par, Ladies Special, Jawan, and Inspector Zende.The Internet’s Latest CrushThe video has taken social media by storm, with users charmed by Girija’s warmth, humor, and effortless screen presence. Some people have been curious to know who she is, while others can’t stop appreciating her acting prowess.“Who's this in the blue saree? Seen her trending — drop the name if you know,” wrote one user on X.Another post read, “Marathi actress #GirijaOak has suddenly become one of the most talked-about names on Twitter after a photo of her in a blue saree and sleeveless blouse went viral.”Who Is Girija Oak?Early Life and FamilyBorn on December 27, 1987, in Nagpur, Maharashtra, Girija Oak is the daughter of veteran Marathi actor Girish Oak and homemaker Padmashree Phatak. She is married to filmmaker Suhrud Godbole.EducationAccording to The Times of India, Girija Oak holds a degree in biotechnology from Thakur College of Science and Commerce, Kandivali (East), Mumbai. She also pursued business management and attended theatre workshops before fully venturing into acting.Career in Marathi CinemaGirija has made a mark in the Marathi entertainment industry, starring in notable films such as Gulmohar, Lajja, and Navra Maza Bhavra. She has also acted in a Kannada film, House Full.Bollywood ProjectsIn Hindi cinema, Girija gained recognition for her role as Jabeen in Aamir Khan’s 2007 classic Taare Zameen Par. She went on to appear in Shor in the City (2010) and Shah Rukh Khan’s Jawan (2023). She was also one of the leads in Sony TV’s Ladies Special — a show that followed the lives of four women commuting via Mumbai’s Ladies Special local train.OTT and Recent WorkExpanding her horizons, Girija Oak has appeared in several OTT projects, including Modern Love: Mumbai, 13th: Some Lessons Aren’t Taught in Classrooms, and most recently, Inspector Zende, where she starred opposite Manoj Bajpayee.
